name: You Could Miss It!
description:
Will you get out of bed today?

Created by Xavier Ekkel in one week for Movie Game Jam with music by Nicholas Ekkel, inspired by this scene and this scene and this scene from Ferris Bueller's Day Off.

Post your best times below!

Note: you may need to zoom out to fit the game on your screen (because for some reason I thought 1000x1000 was a good idea).
